about_the_game:
Welcome to D.A.R.P., Operator.


You have been chosen to complete the D.A.R. Program. This mandatory stay will equip you with the skills to overcome any obstacle and complete even the most impossible missions. You will be tested in your Infiltration, Weapons and Explosives skills throughout various objectives.
Candidates unable to comply or show signs of weakness, will be terminated immediately.

Physically manipulate the Enemy to your advantage


Stealth Kill VR Missions is completely Physics based. knock out guards, drag them around, use them as human shields, strategically place them for other guards to spot them or use them to unlock doors. Only limited by your imagination.

Tactical Stealth Action


Built from the ground up to be a Stealth VR game, Stealth Kill VR Missions provides everything you expect and more.
Crouch down and Sneak past guards. Throw Magazines or other items to distract, or even Knock on walls to attract the guards. Knock out guards for their buddies to find them. Experience real, physical Tactical Stealth Action.

Fight Bosses & Uncover the story


Throughout the missions you'll encounter other operatives that you'll have to fight to proceed. From Tanks, Attack Choppers to Special Forces and Special Agents. Beat them all to please the Committee.

Key features

  • VR Stealth Action - In the new era of VR, experience a Stealth Game like never before. Never have you ever experienced the real thrill of being right inside the action. Sneak past guards, take them out by CQC or various weapons that you might acquire throughout your missions. Knockout guards and drag them through the level to find the best hiding spot, while physically looking around to not get spotted.
  • Various missions and objectives - From sneaking missions to weapons missions to special operations. D.A.R.P. is determined to train their operatives for the upcoming.
  • Story - Why am I here? What is going on? Why do I have to complete these missions? Uncover the secrets of D.A.R.P. and the Committee.
  • Boss battles - Each mission category ends with a boss battle specifically designed to test your skills. From tanks, attack choppers to special forces and special agents.

content_descriptors.notes:
Killing enemies, killing with knife and other weapons, beating and knocking out enemies.
The violence is optional in most levels.

name: Stealth Kill VR Missions Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

short_description: Welcome to D.A.R.P., Operator. You have been chosen to prove your Infiltration, Weapons and Explosives skills throughout various objectives in this Physics based Stealth Action VR Game. Candidates unable to comply or show signs of weakness, will be terminated immediately.
